title: 如何取消建筑权限
author: 酷车手BB弹
txt_content: 我已经弄了分世界权限了，我想让一个世界任何人都不能破坏建造，可是我已经取消了用户组在那个世界的建筑权限为啥还可以拆？求解，还是权限节点英文弄错了？？

replies.author: 网络摆渡客
replies.txt_content:
酷车手BB弹 发表于 2015-1-14 19:47
这是config的
你的默认组都是builder组，所以要将builder组info节点的build: true改为false

replies.author: 网络摆渡客
replies.txt_content: 请你把该组目前的权限状态贴上来。

replies.author: 西瓜太郎
replies.txt_content: 默认权限组要设置建筑权限

replies.author: HotPe_e
replies.txt_content:
输入这个
/mangaddp builder -essentials.craft.build.*
禁止所以建筑权限

replies.author: 酷车手BB弹
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 酷车手BB弹 于 2015-1-14 19:50 编辑 
网络摆渡客 发表于 2015-1-14 07:40
请你把该组目前的权限状态贴上来
。这是config的

settings:
  config:
    # With this enabled anyone set as op has full permissions when managing GroupManager
    # The user will be able to promote players to the same group or even above.
    opOverrides: true

    # Default setting for 'mantogglevalidate'
    # true will cause GroupManager to attempt name matching by default.
    validate_toggle: true
    # ************************************************************************************************************************************************************
    # *** NOTE: Having this feature enabled can allow improper use of Command Blocks which may lead to undesireable permission changes. You have been warned! ***
    # ************************************************************************************************************************************************************
    allow_commandblocks: false

  data:
    save:
      # How often GroupManager will save it's data back to groups.yml and users.yml
      minutes: 10
      # Number of hours to retain backups (plugins/GroupManager/backup)
      hours: 24

  logging:
    # Level of detail GroupManager will use when logging.
    # Acceptable entries are - ALL,CONFIG,FINE,FINER,FINEST,INFO,OFF,SEVERE,WARNING
    level: INFO

  mirrors:
        # Worlds listed here have their settings mirrored in their children.
        # The first element 'world' is the main worlds name, and is the parent world.
        # subsequent elements 'world_nether' and 'world_the_end' are worlds which will use
        # the same user/groups files as the parent.
        # the element 'all_unnamed_worlds' specifies all worlds that aren't listed, and automatically mirrors them to it's parent.
        # Each child world can be configured to mirror the 'groups', 'users' or both files from its parent.
        world:
          world_nether:
          - users
          - groups
          world_the_end:
          - users
          - groups
          all_unnamed_worlds:
          - users
          - groups
          zhucheng:
          - users
          paoku:
          - users
          kxcs:
          - users
          wk:
          - users
          cssc:
          - users
    #  world2:      (World2 would have it's own set of user and groups files)
    #    world3:
    #    - users    (World3 would use the users.yml from world2, but it's own groups.yml)
    #    world4:
    #    - groups   (World4 would use the groups.yml from world2, but it's own users.yml)
    #  world5:
    #    - world6   (this would cause world6 to mirror both files from world5)


这是默认组的（没分开的）

# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# and are inherited from the GlobalGroups.yml.
#
# Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world

replies.author: 酷车手BB弹
replies.txt_content:
灬友情灬 发表于 2015-1-14 13:04
输入这个
/mangaddp builder -essentials.craft.build.*
禁止所以建筑权限
我要其中一个世界才禁止的= =

replies.author: 酷车手BB弹
replies.txt_content:
网络摆渡客 发表于 2015-1-14 22:34
你的默认组都是builder组，所以要将builder组info节点的build: true改为false
啊？！不对吧，我修改文件全是改group组的啊，你看我builder都没动过？？！？！？！

replies.author: 网络摆渡客
replies.txt_content:
酷车手BB弹 发表于 2015-1-14 23:51
啊？！不对吧，我修改文件全是改group组的啊，你看我builder都没动过？？！？！？！ ...
group组？没有这个组。

Default/Builder/vip1/vip2等这些是平级的组。
你应该修改Builder组的。修改完后添加下面的权限：    - essentials.build.drop.*         #丢弃
    - essentials.build.interact.*     #交互
    - essentials.build.pickup.*       #捡拾
    - essentials.build.use.*          #使用复制代码

我发现连吃东西都吃不了咋办

replies.author: 网络摆渡客
replies.txt_content:
酷车手BB弹 发表于 2015-1-18 21:09
我发现连吃东西都吃不了咋办
已经取消成功了是吗？
再添加下面的权限：    - essentials.build.drop.*         //丢弃
    - essentials.build.interact.*     //交互
    - essentials.build.pickup.*       //捡拾
    - essentials.build.use.*          //使用复制代码

replies.author: 酷车手BB弹
replies.txt_content:
网络摆渡客 发表于 2015-1-18 21:12
已经取消成功了是吗？
再添加下面的权限：
    - essentials.build.interact.*     //交互
这个不是可以破坏放置方块吗？？？？

replies.author: 网络摆渡客
replies.txt_content:
酷车手BB弹 发表于 2015-1-19 19:02
- essentials.build.interact.*     //交互
这个不是可以破坏放置方块吗？？？？ ...
这个是开箱、挥剑、按键等操作。
破坏是destroy和break
